solution_line_template: If {num_kids} kids each make {cards_per_kid} cards, they will have made {cards_made} cards because {num_kids}*{cards_per_kid} = <<{num_kids}*{cards_per_kid}={cards_made}>>{cards_made}.
Since {required_cards}-{cards_made} = <<{required_cards}-{cards_made}={cards_needed}>>{cards_needed}, they need to make {cards_needed} more cards.
